thread.title: ‘Plenty of places’ will hire you if you’re fired for being gay
thread.title_full: ‘Plenty of places’ will hire you if you’re fired for being gay - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: ‘Plenty of places’ will hire you if you’re fired for being gay
text: DES MOINES -- Sen. Rand Paul (R-Ky.) drew immediate criticism from gay rights groups Wednesday after telling an audience at Drake University that there was no need to add protections for gender identity to anti-discrimination statutes. "I think, really, the things you do in your house, we can just leave those in the house, and […] ...
